instruction:
Generate a headline and a brief summary of an article 
on the social and psychological impact of COVID-19
output: The Mental Health Crisis of Coronavirus: Examining the Social and Psychological Impacts of the Pandemic. As coronavirus continues to spread, we are faced with the serious, long-term impacts of the pandemic on our mental health, as it disrupts our lives and takes its toll on our mental health in unprecedented ways. This article looks at the social and psychological impacts of the virus and what measures and strategies can be taken to cope with the enormous mental health burden it has created.
